name: Juan Pablo Torres
description: '''Juan Pablo Torres Morell''' (August 17, 1946 â€“ April 17, 2005) was a Cuban trombonist, bandleader, arranger and producer. He was the director of Algo Nuevo and a member of [[Irakere]], two of the leading exponents of [[songo music|songo]] and [[Afro-Cuban jazz]] in the 1970s and 1980s. He has also directed various Cuban [[supergroup (music)|supergroups]] such as [[Estrellas de Areito]] and Cuban Masters. He has been called "one of the best trombone players in the Latin-jazz community of the 1990s".
